title: Nomadful
author: Manuel Zarroca
excerpt: Nomadful puts essential mental well-being resources right at your fingertips. The app's comprehensive set of features allows you to start breathing routines, relax and unwind with sounds, write in a journal, and log your mood to get insights and stats.
text: FreeNomadful puts essential mental well-being resources right at your fingertips. The app's comprehensive set of features allows you to start breathing routines, relax and unwind with sounds, write in a journal, and log your mood to get insights and stats.Launched inHealth byNomadful
html:
Free

Nomadful puts essential mental well-being resources right at your fingertips. The app's comprehensive set of features allows you to start breathing routines, relax and unwind with sounds, write in a journal, and log your mood to get insights and stats.
